participant_1.background:
Last month the farm was foreclosed so i m looking for a new job.
I live in kansas.
I would like to move some place warmer.
I like watching reality television shows.
I m an out of work farmhand.

participant_2.background:
I make robots for a living.
I am single and live alone.
I am a night owl.
I do not have a good social life.

content.text: I'm so sorry to hear about your farm. That must have been a tough time.
Thanks. It was. But I'm trying to stay positive and look for a new job.
That's good. I'm sure you'll find something soon.
I hope so. I'm not sure what I'm going to do if I don't.
Well, you could always move to a warmer place. I hear that California is nice this time of year.
I've thought about that. But I don't know anyone there.
Well, you could always make new friends. I'm sure you'd have no trouble finding people to hang out with.
I guess you're right. I'll have to give it some thought.
Good. And don't forget, I'm always here for you if you need anything.
